name: Ivus the Forest Lord
tooltip:
Ivus the Forest LordLevel 60

The Frostwolf Clan is protected by a taint of elemental energy. Their shaman meddle in powers that will surely destroy us all if left unchecked.

The damage has grown too great for the Circle to control! Ivus must be called to our aid.

The Frostwolf soldiers carry elemental charms called storm crystals. We can use the charms to conjure Ivus. Venture forth and claim the crystals, <name>!

Requirements:
- Storm Crystal
